thread.title: Ottawa shooting inflated the rhetoric of 'homegrown terrorism'
thread.title_full: Ottawa shooting inflated the rhetoric of 'homegrown terrorism' - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Ottawa shooting inflated the rhetoric of 'homegrown terrorism'
text: As Canadians mark the one-year anniversary of the Ottawa shooting today, Muslim communities around the country will be sharing in the sorrow at the deaths of Cpl. Nathan Cirillo and Warrant Officer Patrice Vincent but will also be reminded of some of the ugly rhetoric that accompanied the tragedy and the unwelcome attention it drew to their faith. ...
